title: Will Edge support QUIC protocol introduced by Google?
body: Will Edge support QUIC protocol introduced by Google?

comments.body: I am raising thus again seeing that Cloudflare, Google Chrome, and Firefox have all added HTTP/3 support. When will MS Edge gain support for HTTP/3, the next major iteration of the HTTP protocol?
QUIC/HTTP will be renamed HTTP/3 based on https://arstechnica.com/gadgets/2018/11/the-next-version-of-http-wont-be-using-tcp/ . It would be nice for Edge to get early support for this.
I strongly recommend implementing the quic protocol in edge browser.
